amendment.description: To prohibit employers who unlawfully employ aliens from receiving government contracts.

vote.text: Amendment SA 148 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 94 - 0. Record Vote Number: 31.

action.text: Amendment SA 148 proposed by Senator Sessions to Amendment SA 100. (consideration: CR S1173-1179; text: CR S1173-1174) To prohibit employers who unlawfully employ aliens from receiving government contracts.
